trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.SortDescription"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en samling av <xref href="System.ComponentModel.SortDescription"> </xref> objekter.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.SortDescriptionCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.SortDescriptionCollection"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Removes all items from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner alle elementer fra samlingen.

trans-unit.source: The base class calls this method when the list is being cleared.
trans-unit.target: Basisklassen kaller opp denne metoden når listen er tømt.

trans-unit.source: This implementation raises the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Opphøyer for denne implementeringen av <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>hendelsen.</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.ClearItems%2A> method of the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> base class.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.ClearItems%2A>-metoden til <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601>base klasse.</xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> </xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.ClearItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an item is added or removed.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når et element er lagt til eller fjernet.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets an empty and non-modifiable instance of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.SortDescriptionCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter en tom og ikke kan endres forekomst av <xref href="System.ComponentModel.SortDescriptionCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Inserts an item into the collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Setter inn et element i samlingen i den angitte indeksen.

trans-unit.source: The base class calls this method when an item is added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Basisklassen kaller opp denne metoden når et element i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: This implementation raises the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Opphøyer for denne implementeringen av <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>hendelsen.</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.InsertItem%2A> method of the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> base class.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.InsertItem%2A>-metoden til <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601>base klasse.</xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> </xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.InsertItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index where the `item` is inserted.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen der den `item` er satt inn.

trans-unit.source: The object to insert.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som skal settes inn.

trans-unit.source: Removes the item at the specified index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner elementet i den angitte indeksen i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: The base class calls this method when an item is removed from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Basisklassen kaller opp denne metoden når et element fjernes fra samlingen.

trans-unit.source: This implementation raises the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Opphøyer for denne implementeringen av <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>hendelsen.</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.RemoveItem%2A> method of the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> base class.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.RemoveItem%2A>-metoden til <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601>base klasse.</xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> </xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.RemoveItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the element to remove.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen for elementet til å fjerne.

trans-unit.source: Replaces the element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Erstatter elementet i den angitte indeksen.

trans-unit.source: The base class calls this method when an item is set in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Basisklassen kaller opp denne metoden når et element som er angitt i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: This implementation raises the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Opphøyer for denne implementeringen av <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>hendelsen.</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.SetItem%2A> method of the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> base class.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.SetItem%2A>-metoden til <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601>base klasse.</xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> </xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.SetItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the element to replace.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen for elementet skal erstatte.

trans-unit.source: The new value for the element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Den nye verdien for elementet i den angitte indeksen.
